short_summary: Acquisition and classification of airborne topographic LiDAR data in Manitoba
description: By means of the RFP, Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking proposals from bidders for Acquisition and classification of airborne LiDAR data in Manitoba.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Acquisition and Classification of Airborne Topographic LiDAR Data in Manitoba
## Project Title
The Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking proposals from qualified vendors for the Acquisition and Classification of Airborne Topographic LiDAR Data in Manitoba.

## Project Overview
NRCan intends to award two (2) contracts for the acquisition and classification of airborne topographic LiDAR data in Manitoba. The selected vendors will be responsible for acquiring and classifying high-resolution LiDAR data using aircraft-based systems.

## Key Dates
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 21, 2024, at 14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

## Technical Requirements
The proposed solution must meet the following requirements:
- **UNSPSC Code**: 81151604 (Land surveying), 82131601 (Aerial photography services)
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other relevant agreements.

## Contact Information
For questions or clarifications, please contact:
- **Name**: Marie-Josée Michaud
- **Email**: marie-josee.michaud@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (418) 563-6916
- **Street Address**: 1055 du P.E.P.S., PO BOX 10380, Quebec, QC G1V 4C7, Canada

## Documents
The project documents can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33536/npp---nrcan-5000079924.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33536/npp---nrcan-5000079924.pdf)

## Clarifications and Amendments
For any questions or clarifications, please refer to the project documents or contact the above-mentioned contact information.  Answer any follow-up questions or address any concerns related to this notice before the closing date.  Agents du gouvernement de la province de Québec, vous devrez conclure un accord de paysage ou effectuer toute modification correspondante.
